scripts.build: cd plainly-aescripts && yarn install --immutable && yarn build && cd ../plainly-plugin && yarn install --immutable && yarn build
scripts.prepare-aescripts: cd plainly-aescripts && yarn install --immutable && yarn build
scripts.prepare-plugin: cd plainly-plugin && yarn install --immutable && yarn build
scripts.husky-check: cd plainly-aescripts && yarn biome && cd ../plainly-plugin && yarn biome
